title: Picnic and BBQ Area, Ceiling Fans in most of the unit
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath, approximately 1032 Sq.
Situated in the East Bay, and just a short distance to San Jose and San Francisco, The Promenade offers apartment homes with many desirable features.

With the convenience of great malls, parks, recreational activities, cultural arts, restaurants and employers nearby, and a short distance to historic downtown Pleasanton, The Promenade is an ideal community in an ideal location.
This exquisite community offers charming landscaped grounds, a sparkling pool and spa, contemporary amenities and much more.

Washers and Dryers in Every Apartment, Townhouse Design (Parkway), Contemporary Vertical and Mini Blinds, One and Two Bedroom Apartments and Spacious Townhomes, Private Storage Areas in unit, Dramatic 9 Foot and Vaulted Ceilings in 2nd floor, Fireplaces on 2nd floor apartment home only, Wall to Wall Carpet, Spacious Linen and Enormous Closets, Ceiling Fans in most of the unit, Private Patio and Balconies, Central Heating and Air Conditioning

Easy Access to I-680 and I-580, State of the Art Fitness Center, Gorgeous Landscaping, Resort Style Swimming Pool and Deck with Spa, Pet Friendly Apartments, Picnic and BBQ Area, Convenient Carport Parking, Minutes from Historic Downtown Pleasanton, Two Tot Lots & Wading Pool, Fantastic Clubhouse, Beautifully Designed Mediterranean Style Architecture
Combined gross income at least 2.5 times the monthly rate.
